title: A few weeks ago I managed to activate Google text alert service with my Pixel 3a .It made me unwell.
content:
This may sound stupid but I managed to activate a text alert service that brought up text before my eyes. Apparently lots of people had this problem and it was driving them crazy. The only way I could stop it was by smashing my phone!ðŸ˜©

Iâ€™m sure Iâ€™m not the first person to report this. Do you have any ideas on why this happened?
